roleset.name: be located in

role.descr: M-LOC location, where arg1 is based

example.name: base-v (according to the tree): showing physical location
base-v: With agent
example.text: When referring to the achievements made in recent years by greatly investing in national infrastructure , Xiang Wang , concurrently a member of the national CPPCC , a member of the Standing Committee of the Jiangxi Province CPPCC , president of the Group , etc . said frankly to the reporters that " basing ourselves in the inland and ' building bridges and paving roads ' for the development of the local economy was a wise choice on my part . "

example.name: base-v: All arguments
example.text: They based the company in Southern California but maintained a Boulder operation .

example.name: based-j
example.text: Using the city where I am based as an example , nearly all the medium and small - sized state - owned enterprises have closed down

roleset.note: BASE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'base' based on first handful of sentences from big corpus; adjectival 'based' based on BOLT-6. (from base.01-v)
BASED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from based.01-j)
Arg 0 added by Claire due to instances in ectb revisions. (from base.01-v)

roleset.name: justified by, made up of

role.descr: justification, parts/ arg1 is made up of what?

example.name: base-v: justify
example.text: ... a market structure based on such variables

example.name: base-v: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Television stations have always based their decisions on ratings , and it is virtually impossible to expect that they will change a proven formula .

example.name: base-v: adverbial, with trace
example.text: Milton Roy will pay an initial $ 4 million for the operations and additional payments during the next four years based on the earnings performance of the businesses .

propbank.arg: additional payments during the next four years
on the earnings performance of the businesses

example.name: base-v: adverbial
example.text: The exact amount of the refund will be determined next year based on actual collections made until Dec. 31 of this year .

propbank.arg: The exact amount of the refund
on actual collections made until Dec. 31 of this year

roleset.note: BASE-V NOTES: DO NOT TAG prepositional usages (where verb actually heads prepositional node: "However, based on current public opinion polls , it appears that whoever wins , Lien included , will be only a 'plurality president,' without a strong mandate to rule."); these are base.ER. (from base.02-v)

roleset.name: the starting-point or control state of an entity, which is used for comparison

role.descr: instrument; thing that establishes baseline value

example.name: baseline-n
example.text: Our current CT - scan can serve as a new baseline for future comparison .

example.name: baseline-j
example.text: We will get a baseline EKG .

roleset.note: BASELINE NOTES: Added for THYME AMR.
